getting_started.title: ğŸš€ Getting Started with Trading Signals
getting_started.intro: Welcome! This guide will help you understand how to use trading signals effectively.
getting_started.section_1_content: Trading signals are real-time notifications that suggest when to buy or sell an asset. Our signals are generated by advanced algorithms analyzing market conditions.
getting_started.section_2_content: Free users must manually approve each signal in the Mini App. Premium users can enable auto-execution for hands-free trading.
getting_started.section_3_content: Always use stop-loss and take-profit levels. Never risk more than you can afford to lose.
getting_started.cta: Ready to start? Open the Mini App to view live signals.

risk_management.title: âš ï¸ Risk Management Essentials
risk_management.intro: Proper risk management is the foundation of successful trading.
risk_management.section_1_content: Never risk more than 1-2% of your account on a single trade. Calculate position size based on your stop-loss distance.
risk_management.section_2_content: Always use stop-loss orders to limit potential losses. Our signals include recommended stop-loss levels.
risk_management.section_3_content: Don't put all your eggs in one basket. Trade multiple instruments and avoid overexposure to any single asset.
risk_management.cta: Learn more about risk settings in the Mini App.

automation.title: âš™ï¸ Automated Trading with Premium
automation.intro: Premium subscribers can automate signal execution for hands-free trading.
automation.section_1_content: When a signal is generated, it's automatically sent to your broker for execution. No manual approval needed.
automation.section_2_content: Auto-execution includes built-in safety checks: maximum drawdown limits, daily loss caps, and emergency pause.
automation.section_3_content: Even with automation, monitor your trades regularly. Check the analytics dashboard for performance insights.
automation.cta: Upgrade to Premium to enable auto-execution.
